title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values displayed differently in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed differently in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: I expect the datetime values to be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Input new Date() as the content for three items.
2. Save and preview the items.

Expected result:
The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.

Actual result:
The datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item are different.
